title: Classification of Academic Papers Using LLM
summary: A multiclass classification of papers, comparing the performance of different SVM, MLP (Multilayer Perceptron) and LLM models and techniques.

title: Detection and Automated Counting of Yields in Images
imgFigcaption: Yields Detecteds in Petri and Blade images
summary: Implementation of an algorithm to autimatically detect and count the amount of yeilds in picures of petri dish and blade.
